com.nutiteq.styles

Class LineStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.styles.Style
      • com.nutiteq.styles.LineStyle

  • public class LineStyle
extends Style
    A style for lines. Contains attributes for configuring how the line is drawn on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LineStyle

        public LineStyle(long cPtr,
         boolean cMemoryOwn)

      • LineStyle

        public LineStyle(Color color,
         Bitmap bitmap,
         float clickWidth,
         LineEndType lineEndType,
         LineJointType lineJointType,
         float stretchFactor,
         float width)
        Constructs a LineStyle object from various parameters. Instantiating the object directly is
        not recommended, LineStyleBuilder should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        color - The color for the line.
        bitmap - The bitmap for the line.
        clickWidth - The width of the line used for click detection.
        lineEndType - The line's end point type.
        lineJointType - The joint type for the line.
        stretchFactor - The color for the line.
        width - The width for the line.
